businesses.name: Soak Bar Beauty
businesses.business_details:
With over 10-years of experience as a beauty therapist, Carlie Lansdown was part owner and manager of a renowned Brisbane Beauty Salon. Armed with over a decade of experience and industry insight, Carlie got to work finding the perfect location and building the foundations of SOAK in the heart of South Yarra. 

Inspired by the notion of bringing people together in a welcoming and empowering space, SOAK BAR + BEAUTY can deliver something new and exciting to Melbourne.
businesses.product_details:
Melbourne’s premier beauty bar & salon, offering a truly unique beauty experience. Delivering only the highest quality services, accompanied by an extensive range of champagne, wine and cocktails available. With an incredibly intimate and contemporary space, SOAK is sure to be your first choice for pampering. 

SOAK offers premium beauty services such as spray tans, manicures and blow waves, while giving guests the chance to indulge in a selection of premium cocktails, beer, wine and champagne, as well as petite fours and cheese platters. The one-stop-beauty-shop that can host up to 50 people at a time - meaning it’s the ideal destination for a girls’ day out or a private event.
businesses.new_products:

- Beauty care tips and advice on social media

Follow us on instagram @soak.bar
businesses.headline: Fall in Love with taking care of yourself
